thread.title: Broadchurch spoilers: Trish returns to scene of the crime - but will it help her remember?
thread.title_full: Broadchurch spoilers: Trish returns to scene of the crime - but will it help her remember?

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Broadchurch spoilers: Trish returns to scene of the crime - but will it help her remember?
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Broadchurch is set for some tense moments - and a new suspect - in next week's episode as the final series continues. 
A teaser trailer has been unveiled ahead of Monday's installment, and it promises to show viewers what happens when Trish (played by Julie Hesmondhalgh) returns to the scene of the crime. 
Although she says she feels "fine", there is understandable fear in her eyes as she steps into the venue and starts to relive the night of the attack. Broadchurch (Photo: ITV) 
The clip cuts away from the flashback as she stands with detectives. Read More 
"I was so happy that night," she says. Broadchurch (Photo: ITV) Broadchurch (Photo: ITV) 
The episode will also see DC Katie Harford chasing a strong lead on a new suspect with no alibi. Read More 
Cath is also questioned by Ellie Miller and Alec Hardy, and she reveals some very interesting new information about the night of her party. (Photo: ITV) Broadchurch (Photo: ITV) 
The detectives have a breakthrough too in the form of a match on the male DNA found on Trish. 
Meanwhile, an unknown woman walks into the police station too - and after being interviewed by Ellie and Hardy, she reveals some devastating new information. Like us on Facebook
